mapper.select: SELECT si.id, si.sku_name AS title, si.price, si.sku_default_img AS default_img, bt.id AS tm_id, bt.tm_name, bt.logo_url AS tm_logo_url, c3.id as category3_id, c3.`name` as category3_name, 0 as hot_score, bi.id as attr_id, bi.attr_name, bv.value_name as attr_value FROM sku_info si, sku_attr_value sav, base_attr_info bi, base_attr_value bv, base_trademark bt, base_category3 c3 WHERE sav.attr_id = bi.id and sav.var_id = bv.id and sav.sku_id = si.id and si.category3_id = c3.id and si.tm_id=bt.id and c3.id = si.category_id AND si.id = #{skuId}
